mapper.select: SELECT A.COURSE_CODE, A.SEQ, A.TYPE, A.QUESTION, A.QA1, A.QA2, A.QA3, A.QA4, A.ANSWER, A.ANSWER_DESC, A.WEEK, A.LEVEL, A.USE_YN, A.ORD, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(A.UPDATE_DATE, A.CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') LAST_UPDATE_DATE, IFNULL(U2.USER_NAME, U1.USER_NAME) LAST_UPDATE_USER, 'N' NEW_FLAG FROM COURSE_EXAM A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER U1 ON A.CREATE_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER U2 ON A.UPDATE_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE A.COURSE_CODE = #{COURSE_CODE} ORDER BY A.ORD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COURSE_EXAM ( COURSE_CODE, SEQ, TYPE, QUESTION, QA1, QA2, QA3, QA4, ANSWER, ANSWER_DESC, WEEK, LEVEL, USE_YN, ORD, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER ) VALUES ( #{COURSE_CODE}, #{SEQ}, #{TYPE}, #{QUESTION}, #{QA1}, #{QA2}, #{QA3}, #{QA4}, #{ANSWER}, #{ANSWER_DESC}, IFNULL(#{WEEK}, 1), IFNULL(#{LEVEL}, 3), #{USE_YN}, #{ORD}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{SESSION_USER_ID} )
